userManagement.AddUser_FirstName: Please enter the user's first name.
userManagement.AddUser_LastName: Please enter the user's last name.
userManagement.AddUser_UserName: Choose a unique username for the user.
userManagement.AddUser_Password: Set a secure password for the user.
userManagement.AddUser_Address1: Enter the first line of the user's address.
userManagement.AddUser_Address2: Enter the second line of the user's address.
userManagement.AddUser_Checkbox: Check the box to grant permission.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_Costing: Click '+' to add user-specific permissions for costing.
userManagement.AddUser_ApprovalType: Select the approval type for the user.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_Simulation: Click '+' to add user-specific permissions for simulation.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_Master: Click '+' to add user-specific permissions for master approval.
userManagement.AddUser_Master: Select the master for user approval.

addCompany.AddCompany_Cancel: Click here to cancel and go back to the listing page

addRoleComponent.select_all: Click the checkbox to select all permissions for all modules.

addRoleComponent.action: Toggle this switch to allow or disallow action permissions.
